metadata.title: Sample Business Requirements Document
metadata.summary: A comprehensive BRD for implementing a new customer management system
metadata.author: Product Manager

businessContext.problemStatement: Current customer management system lacks modern features, causing inefficiencies in customer service and data management
businessContext.businessObjective: Implement a new customer management system that improves customer service efficiency, data accuracy, and user experience
successCriteria: Reduce customer service response time by 50%
assumptions: System will integrate with existing ERP
Data migration will be completed within 2 weeks

constraints.regulatory: Must comply with GDPR and SOX

acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in with email and password
Create, read, update, and delete customer profiles

nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: System must handle 1000 concurrent users with response time under 2 seconds
nonFunctionalRequirements.security: All data must be encrypted in transit and at rest, with regular security audits
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: System must scale horizontally to support 10,000 users within 2 years
nonFunctionalRequirements.usability: Interface must be intuitive with 95% user adoption rate within 3 months

risks.mitigation: Detailed migration plan with rollback procedures
Comprehensive training program and change management
